sections.heading: impairment; compliance with order
sections.text: A risk retention group which is not chartered and licensed in this state and which is doing business in this state shall comply with a lawful order issued in a voluntary dissolution proceeding or in a delinquency proceeding commenced by the director or the commissio

44-4413.Financial impairment; compliance with order.

A risk retention group which is not chartered and licensed in this state and which is doing business in this state shall comply with a lawful order issued in a voluntary dissolution proceeding or in a delinquency proceeding commenced by the director or the commissioner of any other state if there has been a finding of financial impairment after an examination under section 44-4408.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 514, ยง 13;Laws 1991, LB 236, ยง 52.
